channel.title: [SRL][RS2] Super Power-Miner 2.01 - Forms Coming Soon! [SCAR 2.03]
channel.description:
[b]Notice: This script DOES NOT work with Scar Divi! I need to modify some things in the script for it to work on newer Scar versions.[/b]
It's just another power miner, nothing special. Only that it's my first successfull power miner. :) It uses some of my new ideas that I want to use for all of my scripts, so that's why I really like this script.
I don't know if the randoms work, but I do know they are in the script. So if you ever see the script successfully avoid/solve a random, then please tell me. Or if you see the script have trouble with a random event; please tell me!
The fight runner/avoider used to work 100% properly, but I've seen some problems with it. I've been working on making it much better. So if you are in a fight while running this script and it wont run away there's no need to tell me, because I've seen it happen before. I think I've fixed that problem though.
Alright, the setup may be a little tough for newer Scar users, but don't worry! I'm going to make a form for the setup soon. You will also see some things about 'secondary rocks' in the setup. Anything that mentions the 'secondary rocks' is a setup for another type of rock(s) you'd like to mine (optional). The only way the secondary rock mining will work is if the 'secondary rock' is next to, or near, the 'primary rock.' I still haven't finished the 'secondary rock' feature yet, so I don't think you should use it.
Ore colors! Since there are MANY diffrent types of rocks in RuneScape, I added an ore color setup. The main reason I added an ore color setup is because sometimes I like to power train my mining over at the granite and sandstone rocks in the desert and they don't use the same type of colors as normal ores do. If you are planning to mine normal rocks (copper-rune, etc.), then there's no need to set the ore colors as they are already set for that particular color.
Sometimes my router resets it's connection (basicaly repairs). When that happens, I get disconnected from the internet. So I decided to add a 'connection lost' detector. If you fully disconnect from the game when this happens, the script will log you back in. If it reestablishes the connection, the script will resume what it was doing. I'm still working on this.
Well, this is all I have to say about the script right now. The download link is below if you wish to try the script out. :)
[url=http://moparisthebest.org/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=144854.0;attach=8800][b][u][font=Comic Sans MS][size=13pt]Download Script[/size][/font][/u][/b][/url]
Have fun cheating, ~Dizzy
[b]List of some features:
[ul][*]Auto Login (of course) [*]Disconnection detector/anti-random [*]The usual anti-randoms [*]Fight runner/avoider (anti-random) [*]Smooth dropping procedure [*]Moves character if cannot find rock (still needs working on) [*]For above: After moves to far, will go back to rocks (still needs working on) [*]Multi-rock mining [*]Rock search ranges (close to you, close to far away, and default/nearby - also being worked on)[/ul]
[b]Coming Soon:
[ul][*]Auto-Color Updating [*]Pickaxe head finder (anti-random) [*]Low-health detector [*]World hopping ;) [*]Character list/player switching[/ul]
[b]Script Report Coming Soon[/b][br][size=1]Posted on: May 26, 2007, 07:29:12 PM[/size][hr]Well...atleast it was downloaded a few times. :|
If you plan on trying the script out, then [u]please[/u] take the time to say what you think about it. :)

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Super Power-Miner 2.01 - Forms Coming Soon! [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

I would not dear to use this script until Pick axe head detection is enabled. I also do not like the way how you use bitmaps (As to that they’re to big) as other users could have different screen resolutions. The log in procedure could possibly get you banned, use the basic DeclarePlayers and the SRL log in procedure.

And script_owned4, don’t be too rough as SMASH is (I think) a beginner at SCAR. Just stop teasing everybody that don’t know anything and help them.

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Super Power-Miner 2.01 - Forms Coming Soon! [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @SantaClause SantaClause
item.description:
@SantaClause wrote:

The standards burn my eyes.

Here you go:

[code]{----;: Super Power-Miner :;------------------------------------}
{----;: Created by Dizzy / Dizzy’s Coding Crew :;---------------}
{----;: Mines up to 2 diffrent rock types :;--------------------}
{----;: After obtains full load, it will discard all ores :;----}
{----;: Sorry for the tough looking setup. You will get the, :;-}
{----;: hang of it. (Scruot setup form coming soon!) :;---------}

program AutoMiner;

const

//Login setup
UsernameM = ‘PutYourUsernameHere’; //Your username
PasswordM = ‘PutYourPasswordHere’; //Your password

//Character setup
RunningOn = True; //Would you like your character to have run on?

//Mining setup
OreLoads = 100; //How many inv loads of primary rock?
OreLoadsX = 5; //How many loads of secondary rock? X rocks
RockTimer = 7; //How long does it usually take for you to mine the rock?
OtherRockMark = 10; //How many loads to mine until the script switches rocks
PickEquipped = True; //Do you have your pickaxe equipped?
DropSpeed = 300; //How fast do you want to drop items? Milliseconds
RockRange = 1; //0 = default, 1 = nearby (2 and 3 in development/coming soon)
MineOthers = False; //Do you want to mine the other rock colors? X rocks

//Primary rock setup
RockColor1 = 2832731; //Color of rock you want to mine
RockColor2 = 1581108; //Secondary color of rock you want to mine
RockColor3 = 3030887; //Third color of rock you want to mine

//Secondary rock setup
RockColorX1 = 0; //Another rock you want to mine
RockColorX2 = 0;
RockColorX3 = 0;

//Ore color setup
OreColorS1 = 5008774; //Color of ore in inventory - I suggest brownish part
OreColorS2 = 8947858; //Another color of ore in inventory

//Secondary ore color setup
OreColorX1 = 5140361; //Color of secondary ore for X rocks
OreColorX2 = 4678779;

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

var
SwingPick, MinedOre, Connectionlost : Integer;
RocksMined, FightsFound, GasFoundX, OreLoadsXX : Integer;
MineMode, ColorUpdateMark : Integer;
AutoRockColor, RockModeMark : Integer;
IsMiningRock, ConnectedToGame : Boolean;
RColor1, RColor2, RColor3, RRange, PicksX, LostCount : Integer;
RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY : Integer;

procedure ScriptLog;
begin
Writeln(‘Super Power Miner by Dizzy – Script Log:’);
Writeln(’----------’);
Writeln('Ores Mined: ’ + IntToStr(RocksMined));
Writeln('Loads Mined: ’ + IntToStr(OreLoadsXX));
Writeln('Fights Found: ’ + IntToStr(FightsFound));
Writeln(‘Gas Found: ’ + IntToStr(GasFoundX));
Writeln(‘Randoms Found: ’ + IntToStr(PicksX));
Writeln(’----------’);
end;

function LoginMyPlayer(MyUserX, MyPassX : string) : boolean;
var
WelcomeToRS, tx, ty, tryToConnect : Integer;
begin
WelcomeToRS := BitmapFromString(26, 10, ‘z78DAA554490E03210CFBD2A878A4’ +
‘F648D5E1FF4FAA843964641C519A830F218B312178A29E68C6F00’ +
‘07045CFD1AD5CA5E1C5D34DEC7D07768FABE9B891897A5CC75BFD’ +
‘D0373FA57F602D6F80E894C9D9C65BE79ABBC85C9FC1ED8376D69’ +
‘FB9991B69AEEB1EEB5031A7C09E6EEB9CF3D7A14AFF74B99D8ADA’ +
‘2E32AFB6A780EABC92A5964FA67BA3156EF924E47F61CC5BDC152’ +
‘1DEA9AA7E62F4EBB69964853D70A4C619880CF52F10F5EE2397E8’ +
‘3692F827FB2AEE34516C12E3B671C72F60BE6A8F’);
if (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(WelcomeToRS, x, y, 210, 177, 500, 322, 15)) then
begin
Mouse(458, 288, 5, 5, True);
Wait(400 + random(200));
SendText(MyUserX + chr(13));
Wait(500 + random(200));
SendText(MyPassX);
Wait(300 + random(200));
Mouse(307, 321, 8, 4, True);
Wait(1000 * 5);
if (FindText(tx, ty, ‘nvalid’, upchars, 240, 180, 530, 240)) then
begin
Writeln(‘PROBLEM: Invalid username or password!’);
TerminateScript;
end
else
if (FindText(tx, ty, ‘rror con’, upchars, 240, 180, 530, 240)) then
begin
Writeln(‘PROBLEM: Error connecting to server.’);
Writeln(‘Going to stop script…’);
Writeln(‘I still need to make a proper handler for retrying. Sorry…’);
TerminateScript;
end
else
if (not (FindText(tx, ty, ‘nvalid’, upchars, 240, 180, 530, 240))) then
begin
Writeln(‘Note: Waiting 9 seconds just incase internet speed is slow.’);
Wait(1000 * 9 + random(2) + 1);
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 16777215, 351, 325, 490, 343, 5)) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 6, 6, True);
Wait(2000 + random(1400));
if (GetColor(584, 483) = 3852287) then
begin
Result := True;
ConnectedToGame := True;
end
else
if (not (getColor(584, 483) = 3852287)) then
begin
Writeln(‘PROBLEM: Login probably failed.’);
TerminateScript;
end;
end;
end;
end
else
begin
Writeln(‘Already logged in.’);
end;
FreeBitmap(WelcomeToRS);
end;

function IsInFight(hpbar : Integer) : boolean;
begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, hpbar, 233, 135, 276, 149, 5)) then
begin
Result := True;
end
else
begin
Result := False;
end;
end;

procedure CheckConnection;
var
IsConnected : Boolean;
WelcomeToRS : Integer;
begin
WelcomeToRS := BitmapFromString(26, 10, ‘z78DAA554490E03210CFBD2A878A4’ +
‘F648D5E1FF4FAA843964641C519A830F218B312178A29E68C6F00’ +
‘07045CFD1AD5CA5E1C5D34DEC7D07768FABE9B891897A5CC75BFD’ +
‘D0373FA57F602D6F80E894C9D9C65BE79ABBC85C9FC1ED8376D69’ +
‘FB9991B69AEEB1EEB5031A7C09E6EEB9CF3D7A14AFF74B99D8ADA’ +
‘2E32AFB6A780EABC92A5964FA67BA3156EF924E47F61CC5BDC152’ +
‘1DEA9AA7E62F4EBB69964853D70A4C619880CF52F10F5EE2397E8’ +
‘3692F827FB2AEE34516C12E3B671C72F60BE6A8F’);
IsConnected := True;
ConnectedToGame := False;
begin
if (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(Connectionlost, x, y, 150, 107, 455, 211, 5)) then
begin
Writeln(‘Looks like we lost connection.’);
Writeln(‘Waiting to fully disconnect or reestablish.’);
repeat
Wait(1000 + Random(1000 * 2 + Random(361)));
if (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(WelcomeToRS, x, y, 210, 177, 500, 322, 15)) then
begin
IsConnected := False;
ConnectedToGame := IsConnected;
FreeBitmap(WelcomeToRS);
Writeln(‘We have been booted from the game.’);
Writeln(‘Waiting 30 seconds before re-connecting.’);
Sleep(1000 * 30);
LoginMyPlayer(UsernameM, PasswordM);
end
else
begin
IsConnected := True;
ConnectedToGame := IsConnected;
end;
until (ConnectedToGame = True)
end;
end;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
if (FindPick = False) then
begin
if (NoPick = True) then
begin
Writeln(‘WARNING: No Pickaxe Available - Logging out!’);
Logout;
TerminateScript;
end;
end;
if (IsInFight(65280)) then
begin
SetRun(True);
MouseFlag(646, 26, 4, 4);
Wait(6000 + random(2000));
MouseFlag(651, 146, 2, 2);
Wait(300 + random(200));
end;
if (FindTalk) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] Someone is talking to us’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (FindMime) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] Mime event detected’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (FindMaze) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] Maze event detected’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (SolveFrog) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] From event detected’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (Findmod) then
begin
Writeln(‘WARNING: Game moderator detected - logging off!’);
Logout;
TerminateScript;
end;
if (solvepinball) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] Pinball event detected’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (findforester) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] Freaky Forester event detected’);
PicksX := PicksX + 1;
end;
if (FindScapeRune) then
begin
Writeln(’[RANDOM] ScapeRune event detected’);
Writeln(‘WARNING: ScapeRune found! Logging off!’);
Logout;
TerminateScript;
end;
CheckConnection;
end;

procedure MiningRock;
begin
if (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(SwingPick, x, y, 20, 416, 208, 431, 20)) then
begin
IsMiningRock := True;
end
else
if (not (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(SwingPick, x, y, 20, 416, 208, 431, 35))) then
begin
IsMiningRock := False;
end;
end;

procedure SleepMe;
var
Sleeper : Integer;
begin
repeat
Sleep(1000);
Randoms;
Sleeper := (Sleeper + 1);
until (FindBitmapSpiralTolerance(MinedOre, x, y, 20, 416, 208, 431, 35) or
(InvCount >= 28) or (Sleeper >= RockTimer))
RocksMined := (RocksMined + 1);
end;

procedure DropOres;
begin
ClickAllItemsColorTolWait(‘Drop’, OreColorS1, 5, DropSpeed);
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, OreColorS2, 561, 211, 730, 458, 5)) then
begin
ClickAllItemsColorTolWait(‘Drop’, OreColorS2, 5, DropSpeed);
end;
RockModeMark := (RockModeMark + 1);
if (RockModeMark = OtherRockMark) then
begin
if (MineMode = 0) then
begin
MineMode := 1;
end
else
if (MineMode = 1) then
begin
MineMode := 0;
end;
end;
end;

procedure MineRocks;
var
FindAttempts : Integer;
begin
if (MineOthers = True) then
begin
if (MineMode = 0) then
begin
RColor1 := RockColor1;
RColor2 := RockColor2;
RColor3 := RockColor3;
end
else
if (MineMode = 1) then
begin
RColor1 := RockColorX1;
RColor2 := RockColorX2;
RColor3 := RockColorX3;
end;
end
else
if (MineOthers = False) then
begin
RColor1 := RockColor1;
RColor2 := RockColor2;
RColor3 := RockColor3;
end;
if (RockRange = 1) then
begin
RangeXX := 197;
RangeXXX := 294;
RangeYY := 102;
RangeYYY := 209;
end
else
if (RockRange = 0) then
begin
RangeXX := 25;
RangeYY := 23;
RangeXXX := 440;
RangeYYY := 294;
end;
repeat
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor1, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor2, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor3, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10))) then
begin
MMouse(x, y, 2, 2);
Wait(100 + random(50));
if (IsUpText(‘ine’)) then
begin
GetMousePos(x, y);
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, True);
Flag;
Randoms;
Wait(600 + random(410));
MiningRock;
if (IsMiningRock) then
begin
FindAttempts := 0;
LostCount := 0;
GasCheck(x, y - 4);
SleepMe;
end;
end
else
if (not (IsUpText(‘Mine’))) then
begin
SleepAndMoveMouse(400 + random(600));
FindAttempts := (FindAttempts + 1);
if (FindAttempts >= 11) then
begin
Mouse(298 + random(10) - random(5), 111 + random(10) - random(4), 5, 5, True);
Flag;
Wait(300 + random(200));
LostCount := (LostCount + 1);
if (LostCount >= 4) then
begin
if (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, 5392717, 600, 48, 664, 133, 30)) then
begin
Mouse(x, y, 5, 5, True);
Flag;
Wait(300 + random(200));
end;
end;
end;
end;
end
else
if (not (FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor1, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor2, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10)) or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x, y, RColor3, RangeXX, RangeYY, RangeXXX, RangeYYY, 10)))) then
begin
SleepAndMoveMouse(1000 + random(200));
FindAttempts := (FindAttempts + 1);
end;
until (InvCount >= 28)
end;

procedure LoadMinerBmp;
begin

SwingPick := BitmapFromString(56, 7, ‘z78DAB595C10AC4200C447FC9164AE’ +
‘B3181FDFF5F5AB03D44E24CC75DF410C2289A794DD5AB1DD7E62D’ +
‘9636BADCCC2FF3B0E689B79E239F8DD1ED53776925AA41897BADE’ +
‘791DD495E661D813A95734B1A79E781DE183EFACD33524D790123’ +
‘568EAA852E68FF202FBAEB599EDD2CA5D72981DE80678ADCD7A05’ +
‘AA40BCACBCAEC1A9DAEF054BA0ED043DC149EA83F393794EBCA04’ +
‘4F4463054FD49F51CF0C857B893B5DCE53A1A1F4F03F3C27F7E72’ +
‘F20FF6A289794D53C859B9CFF897025DA99DEFC3FBE14F4E6D779’ +
‘EA557D01F56C1254’);

MinedOre := BitmapFromString(61, 7, ‘z78DAB555410AC3300CFB523618B4C’ +
‘704F6FF2F8DAD3DC8A8526CD6F4608A221C5B51E2D6BEDFD8FB6B’ +
‘7B84D8FBD8FA111B7DB88A9C808FFEDE9F27FEFB3F23AC3213F30’ +
‘404AB823A2F6AA35E1097398BFD4A26760AD157183414FA4B8476’ +
‘5135048ECA468A5DD426B4950A5BA63AD389BB10072F219239E50’ +
‘96E555DA2B6F5764655890BC796D516FADFA0B6F2369F35BF273E’ +
‘5BC687696F4BC75A0FA7FA4D30F3EF526177D5BBC83FD1F6D67E0’ +
‘373B5DAE276CB77DB4F22F2497E6695A740A23B5FA19AB3FFBC24’ +
‘2926DF71F69B55BEC0AC46EBFF2571410D4AED237E008D874169’);
Connectionlost := BitmapFromString(75, 11, ‘z78DAED96510EC0200843AFC429BC’ +
‘FF91F6391393A5584026F473E9D0FA8222F26A4C9256B898935FF’ +
‘FBD9B63CE747BBBAAD9714DF06E82A7CE2486E058F45DD3CA89AF’ +
‘8E38F13A7ED971164816BEBE001311EFB47AC1B53DE891DD6A5D3’ +
‘F82D99C9104F7EEBA0A04B5F7580582CC976C9D5599A0ED2CE197’ +
‘57DB89B8879F283C08327357EB2F7A001D30EEAE’);

end;

begin
Writeln(‘Dizzy’#39’s Coding Crew Presets: Super Power Miner 2.01’);
Writeln(’|—FREE VERSION----|’);
Writeln(‘Loading script bitmaps…’);
LoadMinerBmp;
Writeln(‘Loaded script bitmaps!’);
ActivateClient;
Writeln(‘Setting up SRL…’);
SetupSRL;
Writeln(‘Setting up SRL Mining…’);
SetupSRLMining;
Writeln(‘Loading SRL Mining bitmaps…’);
LoadMiningBitMaps;
Writeln(‘Loaded SRL Mining bitmaps!’);
MineMode := 0;
EquipPick := PickEquipped;
Wait(1000 + random(400));
LoginMyPlayer(UsernameM, PasswordM);
begin
ChatsOff;
SetRun(RunningOn);
repeat
MineRocks;
if (InvCount >= 28) then
begin
Randoms;
DropOres;
Writeln(‘Making sure chats are off…’);
ChatsOff;
end;
ScriptLog;
LoginMyPlayer(UsernameM, PasswordM);
until (OreLoadsXX = OreLoads)
Writeln(‘Miner done.’);
Logout;
end;
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [SRL][RS2] Super Power-Miner 2.01 - Forms Coming Soon! [SCAR 2.03]
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Notice: This script DOES NOT work with Scar Divi! I need to modify some things in the script for it to work on newer Scar versions.

It’s just another power miner, nothing special. Only that it’s my first successfull power miner.
It uses some of my new ideas that I want to use for all of my scripts, so that’s why I really like this script.

I don’t know if the randoms work, but I do know they are in the script. So if you ever see the script successfully avoid/solve a random, then please tell me. Or if you see the script have trouble with a random event; please tell me!

The fight runner/avoider used to work 100% properly, but I’ve seen some problems with it. I’ve been working on making it much better. So if you are in a fight while running this script and it wont run away there’s no need to tell me, because I’ve seen it happen before. I think I’ve fixed that problem though.

Alright, the setup may be a little tough for newer Scar users, but don’t worry! I’m going to make a form for the setup soon.
You will also see some things about ‘secondary rocks’ in the setup. Anything that mentions the ‘secondary rocks’ is a setup for another type of rock(s) you’d like to mine (optional). The only way the secondary rock mining will work is if the ‘secondary rock’ is next to, or near, the ‘primary rock.’
I still haven’t finished the ‘secondary rock’ feature yet, so I don’t think you should use it.

Ore colors! Since there are MANY diffrent types of rocks in RuneScape, I added an ore color setup. The main reason I added an ore color setup is because sometimes I like to power train my mining over at the granite and sandstone rocks in the desert and they don’t use the same type of colors as normal ores do. If you are planning to mine normal rocks (copper-rune, etc.), then there’s no need to set the ore colors as they are already set for that particular color.

Sometimes my router resets it’s connection (basicaly repairs). When that happens, I get disconnected from the internet. So I decided to add a ‘connection lost’ detector. If you fully disconnect from the game when this happens, the script will log you back in. If it reestablishes the connection, the script will resume what it was doing. I’m still working on this.

Well, this is all I have to say about the script right now. The download link is below if you wish to try the script out.

[font=Comic Sans MS][size=13pt]Download Script[/size][/font]

Have fun cheating,
~Dizzy

[b]List of some features:

[ul][]Auto Login (of course)
[]Disconnection detector/anti-random
[]The usual anti-randoms
[]Fight runner/avoider (anti-random)
[]Smooth dropping procedure
[]Moves character if cannot find rock (still needs working on)
[]For above: After moves to far, will go back to rocks (still needs working on)
[]Multi-rock mining
[*]Rock search ranges (close to you, close to far away, and default/nearby - also being worked on)[/ul]

[b]Coming Soon:

[]Pickaxe head finder (anti-random)
[]Low-health detector
[]World hopping
